title: Trump taps a longtime agency economist as the next Bureau of Labor Statistics commissioner
full_text: Trump taps a longtime agency economist as the next Bureau of Labor Statistics commissioner. Brett Matsumoto, who has been with the BLS for over 10 years, may end the monthslong search for a new commissioner after Trump fired the last one.. President Donald Trump said he's nominating Brett Matsumoto, a career economist, to lead the Bureau of Labor Statistics.Kevin Lamarque/Reuters <ul><li>President Donald Trump said he intends to nomin… [+2851 chars]
